description: Airline Upgrade! Move to the nearest airport. If unowned, buy it. If owned, pay double rent.
Security Check! Go back 3 spaces due to long queues.
Currency Exchange Win! Move to Beijing. Collect ₥50.
GET OUT OF CUSTOMS FREE. This card may be kept until needed or traded.
GO TO CUSTOMS. Go directly to Customs. Do not pass GO. Do not collect ₥200.
ADVANCE TO THE NEAREST TOURIST ATTRACTION. If unowned, buy it. If owned, roll dice and pay 10x.
TAKE A TRIP TO TEHRAN. IF YOU PASS GO, COLLECT ₥200.
Luxury Lounge Access! PAY EACH TRAVELER ₥50.
ADVANCE TO LUXOR. IF YOU PASS GO, COLLECT ₥200.
ADVANCE TO ORAN. IF YOU PASS GO, COLLECT ₥200.
ADVANCE TO THE NEAREST AIRPORT. Buy if unowned, else pay double rent.
Hotel Renovation Costs! PAY ₥25 per house, ₥100 per hotel.
